doc.name: mobileAdSetTopLeft
doc.summary: Sets the topLeft position of an ad.

example.p: mobileAdSetTopLeft "my ad", (10,150) -- the brackets here are to make sure the top left is passed as a single parameter

description.overview: Use the mobileAdSetTopLeft command to set the top left postition of an ad.

parameter.name: adName
parameter.description: The name of ad (as specified in mobileAdCreate).

parameter.name: topLeft
parameter.description: The coordinates at which the top left corner of the add should be placed. Use parentheses to pass 2 comma separated values as a single parameter.

description.value: If the ad does not exist the result will contain "ad not found".
description.comments:
The mobileAdSetTopLeft command places the named ad with its top left corner at the specified point.
Before calling this command, you must have registered you app's id using mobileAdRegister. If not, the result will contain "not registered with service".
